resources.string: It looks like you don\'t have any saved passwords! Click the button in the bottom right hand corner to add a new entry.
Place your fingerprint on the fingerprint reader to unlock your passwords.
It looks like this is the first time using the app! Please choose a pin or use your fingerprint to secure your passwords.
It looks like this is the first time using the app! Would you like to secure your passwords with your fingerprint/lock screen?
You can always secure your passwords later. Just go to \'Set up security\' in the menu in the upper right-hand corner.
Enter/Change the service\'s name/website and password in the boxes below:
